channel.title: 667 Coder
channel.description:
This May/May Not be in the correct section, regardless idc.
As the title says i need a 667 Coder. I understand they are hard to come by, especially Good ones.
Requirements: Ability to Add/Edit Npc Hp//drops//Attack Formats. Add//change//edit Skills, such as adding Slayer//Construction//Dung Understanding the Server will Not be released Until it is near perfect, this means majority of Skills working//Npc's//Minigames (these can be added while server is running) Adding NPC dialogue... And more, that i will be testing you on...
What we are working with... I have a 667 already added a New home//20+shops, Donator Zone&More but i am not a Experienced Coder and cannot do more than i would like...
Benefits: Of course you will be Co-Owner/Coder, anywhere from 50-75% of the PayPal Donations will Be yours..
Vps//Hosting, I will not be Hosting through a Vps until i get enough money, But My Computer can hold Many Players and that will not be a problem. Also If you would prefer you Hosting that is fine with me.
Extra Information: Please contact me...

This May/May Not be in the correct section, regardless idc.

As the title says i need a 667 Coder. I understand they are hard to come by, especially Good ones.

Understanding the Server will Not be released Until it is near perfect, this means majority of Skills working//Npc’s//Minigames (these can be added while server is running)

And more, that i will be testing you on…
